rooms.description: Spacious entrance that leads directly to the living space and connects with outdoor garden areas.
Large open-plan living area with natural light from large windows positioned according to Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow. Includes integrated seating area near garden view.
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living room to facilitate family gatherings and social interaction.
Modern minimalist kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and proper ventilation. Open design to connect with dining area and living room.
Spacious master bedroom located towards the north per Vastu guidelines for restful sleep, featuring ample natural light and a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Comfortable guest room with access to shared bathroom facilities and designed with privacy in mind.
Dual-purpose study/library area designed for both work and leisure reading. Natural light from windows oriented eastward as per Vastu principles.
A dedicated entertainment room with acoustic insulation and adjustable ambient lighting. Integrated home theater system to support movie nights.
Functional space for laundry, storage, and other utilities.
Private bathroom serving the master bedroom with natural light fixtures ensuring fresh air circulation.

openings.details: Reinforced door integrated with security system.
Large bay windows for ample natural light and ventilation; oriented per Vastu to enhance energy flow.
Operable windows to allow fresh air circulation.
Direct access to a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Well-designed staircase leading to the upper floors ensuring ease of movement and compliance with safety norms.

levels.description: Ground floor designed with an open plan layout integrating functional spaces, ample natural light, and ventilation. The design adheres to Vastu principles by orienting key rooms appropriately and ensuring smooth circulation throughout the home while incorporating a large garden as a focal point for relaxation.
